about.title: About Grenco
about.intro: A startup specializing in the manufacturing of smart plastic recycling machines. We provide innovative solutions that help **SMEs and factories** reduce costs and achieve environmental sustainability through flexible, efficient machines capable of processing multiple types of plastic

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To develop and manufacture intelligent plastic recycling machines that integrate industrial automation and the Internet of Things, elevating traditional production processes to a data-driven, smart manufacturing system. We focus on providing flexible and efficient solutions for SMEs and factories, enhancing local manufacturing capabilities, and building strong partnerships that contribute to improving and advancing the recycling sectorâ€™s efficiency.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To redefine the future of plastic recycling in the region by transforming it into an advanced industry powered by industrial automation and the Internet of Things. We aim to lead this transformation by delivering smart technologies that elevate efficiency and quality, positioning factories and businesses on the path of modern manufacturing and regional and global competitiveness, supported by continuous research and development in plastic processing technologies.
